subject: VAM pros note working
description_text:
Hi I’m having issues.
I’ve purchased the VAM pros, PSU and plus x control box.

Everything was working for about 5mins, but now I cannot get them to work at all simhub doesn’t see them, and windows isn’t detecting when I plug in the usb cable.

The control box is earthed to my pedal tray 

I’ve tried another usb cable
Direct connection to Pc using either cable
Disconnected the power and usb cables from the control box, then reconnect all to no avail.

One thing I’ve noticed, when I plug the PSU cable into the DC input port on the control box there’s a small spark!

Please advise



Order #ssn2434, #ssn2428

Regards
Rob M

Sent from my iPad

conversations.body_text: 此工单已关闭并合并至工单 3701。
